title: Plain Vanilla Murder
description: *This is book 12 in the Frosted Love Cozy Mystery Series*   A cooking reality show is the stuff of dreams when you own an up-and-coming bakery. Being suspected of murdering one of the judges is not. With Chas far away and storm clouds gathering, Missy has to rely on unfamiliar allies in an unfamiliar place to find the true perpetrator before time runs out on her small screen dreams.  Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the series: Book 1: http://amzn.to/1zyu5vx Book 2: http://amzn.to/1F4EZvi Book 3: http://amzn.to/1Eq21qR Book 4: http://amzn.to/1L0JO7m Book 5: http://amzn.to/1BlRwDY Book 6: http://amzn.to/1Jt6HBP Book 7: http://amzn.to/1B5eAfF Book 8: http://amzn.to/1GftATX Book 9: http://amzn.to/1J27RmG Book 10: http://amzn.to/1f15V44 Book 11: http://amzn.to/1glabvE   Click the “buy now with 1 click” button at the top of the page OR Read it for FREE with Kindle Unlimited.
author: Carol Durand
